sentences.cn: 试试看,给下面的词找出反义词来吧.

sentences.en: Give the synonym and antonym of this word.
sentences.cn: 给出这个词的同义词和反义词.

sentences.en: Guessing word from Synonym and Antonym.
sentences.cn: 通过同义词和反义词的关系猜词.

sentences.en: In English, antonym is a word that is contrary in meaning to another.
sentences.cn: 英语反义词是一种词汇意义相对、相反的词.

sentences.en: Plaintiff is an antonym of defendant.
Regarding the Shortcomings in Antonym Study from Lao Zi's " you " and " wu "
sentences.cn: 从《老子》中的 “ 有 ” 和 “ 无 ” 看现代反义词研究缺陷.

sentences.en: Sad is an antonym of happy.
sentences.cn: sad(悲哀的)是happy(愉快的)的反义词.

trans.tran_en: a word that means the opposite of another word
